attributes.action: keep open the Silver Star Unit at the John Radcliffe Hospital in Oxford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the prime minister to keep open the silver star unit at the john radcliffe hospital in Oxford. We need this unit as it has saved lifes and will continue to do so in the future. Please keep it open.

rejection.details: The creator of this e-petition has been in contact and requested that it is removed.  The Oxford Radcliffe Hospital NHS Trust has also confirmed that there are no plans to close this unit.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
